data.text:
[[File:|link=]]

Episode 2 is an episode in the Yo-Kai Watch anime series.

Summary[]

After meeting the kappa Walkappa, Nate's day at school is disrupted by the Yo-Kai Tattletell, who possesses his friend Katie and makes her say she saw Nate leave the toilet earlier, embarrassing him. Later, Nate uses Tattletell to figure out what is upsetting Katie.

Episode Structure[]
